Differential gene test

Source: R/SCP-analysis.R
RunDEtest.Rd

Differential gene test

Usage

RunDEtest(
  srt,
  group_by = NULL,
  group1 = NULL,
  group2 = NULL,
  cells1 = NULL,
  cells2 = NULL,
  features = NULL,
  FindAllMarkers = TRUE,
  FindPairedMarkers = FALSE,
  FindConservedMarkers = FALSE,
  grouping.var = NULL,
  meta.method = metap::maximump,
  test.use = "wilcox",
  only.pos = TRUE,
  fc.threshold = 1.5,
  base = 2,
  pseudocount.use = 1,
  mean.fxn = NULL,
  min.pct = 0.1,
  min.diff.pct = -Inf,
  max.cells.per.ident = Inf,
  latent.vars = NULL,
  min.cells.feature = 3,
  min.cells.group = 3,
  norm.method = "LogNormalize",
  p.adjust.method = "bonferroni",
  slot = "data",
  assay = "RNA",
  BPPARAM = BiocParallel::bpparam(),
  progressbar = TRUE,
  force = FALSE,
  seed = 11,
  ...
)

Arguments

srt

A Seurat object

group_by

group_by

FindAllMarkers

Whether to find markers across all cells.

FindPairedMarkers

Whether to find markers between pairs of the cell groups.

fc.threshold

fc.threshold

min.pct

min.pct

force

force

seed

Examples

library(dplyr)
data("pancreas_sub")
pancreas_sub <- RunDEtest(pancreas_sub, group_by = "CellType")
#> Warning: Data in the 'data' slot is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data.
#> [2022-12-21 07:34:50] Start DEtest
#> Threads used: 1
#> Perform FindAllMarkers(wilcox)...
#> 
  |                                                                                                                    
  |                                                                                                              |   0%
  |                                                                                                                    
  |==============================================================================================================| 100%
#> 
#> [2022-12-21 07:34:54] DEtest done
#> Elapsed time: 4.37 secs 

de_filter <- filter(pancreas_sub@tools$DEtest_CellType$AllMarkers_wilcox, p_val_adj < 0.05 & avg_log2FC > 1)
ht <- ExpHeatmap(pancreas_sub, features = de_filter$gene, feature_split = de_filter$group1, group.by = "CellType")
#> 'magick' package is suggested to install to give better rasterization.
#> 
#> Set `ht_opt$message = FALSE` to turn off this message.
ht$plot


de_top <- de_filter %>%
  group_by(gene) %>%
  top_n(1, avg_log2FC) %>%
  group_by(group1) %>%
  top_n(3, avg_log2FC)
ht <- GroupHeatmap(pancreas_sub, features = de_top$gene, feature_split = de_top$group1, group.by = "CellType")
#> 'magick' package is suggested to install to give better rasterization.
#> 
#> Set `ht_opt$message = FALSE` to turn off this message.
ht$plot
